channel.title: How can I add ::EMPTY for Admins +?
channel.description: Title says it all, i tried making a few commands, but all got me errors. Could anyone help?

item.title: How can I add ::EMPTY for Admins +?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Exure, post:5, topic:441067”]Pi

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("empty") && playerRights == 2) { c.getPA().removeAllItems(); c.sendMessage("You empty your invatory"); }
Delta

if (command.startsWith("empty") && playerRights > 2) { removeAllItems(); }[/quote]
On the delta one you might aswell add in the message too haha…

if (command.startsWith("empty") && playerRights > 2) { removeAllItems(); c.sM("You emptied your inventory."); }

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add ::EMPTY for Admins +?

item.title: How can I add ::EMPTY for Admins +?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“ston3, post:3, topic:441067”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=543746.msg3985557#msg3985557 date=1335831367]

[/quote]Yes i know, but i actually need an empty code, i tried the && playerrights still didnt work[/quote]

Break what you want to do into logical steps, then look for which methods correspond to each of those steps.
